inkscape:path-effect.helpdata: General Display and position dimension lines and labels Projection Show a line with measurements based on the selected items Options Options for color, precision, label formatting and display Tips Custom styling: To further customize the styles, use the XML editor to find out the class or ID, then use the Style dialog to apply a new style. Blacklists: allow to hide some segments or projection steps. Multiple Measure LPEs: In the same object, in conjunction with blacklists,this allows for labels and measurements with different orientations or additional projections. Set Defaults: For every LPE, default values can be set at the bottom.
